title: What Now? Life, the Leaving Cert and Planning your Next Steps
description: Are you stressing about the end of school? Or freaking out about theLeaving Certificate? Is your head spinning from trying to work outwhat to do once it’s all over? This book provides expert guidance andtried and tested advice on all the major problems and decisionsencountered by young adults in the lead-up to the end of second-leveleducation. Covering topics such as personal and professionaldevelopment, engaging with parents and how best to choose a college oruniversity, this useful guide provides a beneficial perspective on thedifficult question of what to do after finishing school.
author: Cearúil Swords
